sourcesContent:
import React, { Profiler } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Project from './Components/Project' const flutter = [ "https://www.thesprucepets.com/thmb/LPnj-N-AcGdZRvf7E6y_Hsf2vqo=/4089x2300/smart/filters:no_upscale()/close-up-of-a-hamster-eating-groundnut-635096689-5c525f88c9e77c0001d7c1fa.jpg" ]; const mario = [ "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/mario-start.jpg?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/mario_level_one.JPG?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/mario_level_two.JPG?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/mario_mushrooms.JPG?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/mario_castle.JPG?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/mario_running.JPG?raw=true", ]; const apollo = [ "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/apollo-login.JPG?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/apollo-flight-view.JPG?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/apollo-cart.JPG?raw=true", "https://github.com/4yerik/images/blob/master/projects/apollo-upcoming.JPG?raw=true", ]; const apolloText = "To learn how GraphQL and Apollo work together, I followed a tutorial on Apollo's documentation guide." + "In this tutorial, I started with building a schema for my data and writing data fetching methods to a REST API. " + "To save data, I created a custom database for the apollo server to utilize. " + "Afterwards, I implemented GraphQL resolvers and added a pagination solution. " + "Lastly, I connected my React application with my custom Graph API with Apollo Client. " + "The end result is an appllication that can authenticate users, list available flights, and update a user's account with booked flights" ; const identityText = "My first exposure to Machine Learning was a credit card scam detector that analyzed a spreadsheet of numbers. " + "After this exposure, I was interested in exploring the image processing side of Machine Learning. " + "I discovered there are many open source resources for ML image processing. " + "With the use of python libraries such as Numpy and face_reconition, I built a program which is able to detect faces on an image and label them with the appropriate name. " ; const marioText = "As a child, I really enjoyed playing Super Mario Bros and Mario Kart on my Nitendo DS. " + "In 2016, I no longer had my DS so I tried downloading Super Mario Bros to my phone. " + "To my suprise, there was no option available. " + "I had been learning Android Studio for a couple months at that point and decided I wanted to build out a mobile version of Super Mario Bros. " + "This app was my first project that I spent considerable time on (100+ hours). " + "I accomplished a replica of old school Super Mario Bros with the physics library libGDX and the map editor Tiled. " + "My simplified version of Super Mario includes Goomba and Koopa as enemies. " + "Mario's direction is driven by tilt controls and tapping for jumping. " + "Interesting enough, a few months after I completed this app, an official mobile version of Super Mario Bros was released. " + "Knowing how much work my simple version took, I admired the official version all the more." + "I found it to be incredibly well designed and the automatic running to be a good decision. " ; const Projects = () => (

{apolloText}

{identityText}

{marioText}

 ); export default Projects;
